Summary HILIGHTS 
(1) Strong technical, operational and business experience 
• Obtained first class honors degree in Mechanical Engineering from Universiti Malaya.  
• Started career in engineering with Hewlett-Packard/ Agilent Technologies. Set up new production line for LED technology, established quality processes, trained new engineers.  
• Obtained MBA from Universiti Sains Malaysia; thesis on strategic alliance in the IT industry.  
• Embarked on a challenging career with Dell and held various roles from program management, product marketing and business development.  
• Held senior management roles in Intel for customer and partner alliance, business development and product management.  
 
(2) Customer focused and business partnerships 
• Recognized for resolving customer escalation in Hewlett-Packard; awarded “CEO Best Customer Satisfaction” 
• Championed third party product reviews; Dell bagged ICT Singapore’s “2004 Best Home PC Award” and PC.com Malaysia’s “2003 Best Home PC Award” by PC.Com  
• Managed Intel’s current client accounts and established new client pipeline for Asia and Europe. Achieved new business acquisitions in Asia, built new technical and business competencies for organization.  
 
(3) Results driven leadership and team collaboration  
• Awarded “Outstanding Performance” for the flawless launch of seven new Dell systems within 6 months and “Most Valuable Player” for exceeding revenue and margin for two consecutive quarters. 
• Achieved “Total Customer Experience Award” for leading cross functional team from engineering, quality and technical support in reducing warranty cost. 
• Worked effectively with virtual team members and leaders from Americas, EMEA and Asia.
